author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
As reported by @dpiparo there are two scripts in `CondTools/Hcal/test` which contain some pwds written "in clear".
After consultation with @cms-sw/hcal-dpg-l2 and @abdoulline it was decided that these scripts are deprecated
and since they have not been used in 16 years they can be removed.

#### PR validation:
None - just removed two unused scripts unders `CondTools/Hcal/test`

#### Backport:
Not a backport, not sure if backports are needed, @perrotta @rappoccio @dpiparo please advise
title: Remove deprecated HCAL CondTools scripts
